msg: Switch to using a Dispatch client for the discovery as a variety of responses can come back from  a probe.

msg: When using multicast with async callbacks, allow multiple responses.

msg: Add support to turn off the sending of the anonymous ReplyTo

msg: Mina (actually, the JDK nio) cannot do req/resp multicast

msg: HDFS-3672. Expose disk-location information for blocks to enable better scheduling. Contributed by Andrew Wang.
